column5: Hi OFC,  I was wondering where can I purchase a extra spool for a shimano stradic FJ 2500-3000 in the GTA?  I called Basspro and Sail and they don't carry it.  Also does anyone know how much a spool usually costs?
I ordered my spools from shimano in Peterborough
Thank you, do you remember how much it was?
ebay can be very expensive for spools, shop carefully with that  my most recent order was just last week so good timing lol.....stradic FJ 2500 spool, part number 14928, $31.59
And shipping items via eBay from the States nets you a stupid Global Shipling Charge of like $20 minimum. Costs more than the shipping. Cash grab for sure.
Call Shimano in Peterborough. They will transfer you over to the USA offfice. Make sure you order the matching  drag cap. They are not the same.
